Subject: English
ArgumentHeader: One way of representing the line of argument is as follows:

Subject: English
ArgumentStep: Remind the audience of both their connections and vulnerability.

Subject: English
ArgumentStep: Highlight the value of what is at risk.

Subject: English
ArgumentStep: Offer a solution as the only possible ‘lifeline’.

Subject: English
ArgumentStep: Rebut possible objections to undermine backlash.

Subject: English
ArgumentStep: Apply moral pressure and present an image of a rosy future before asking members to vote on the proposal.

Subject: English
ArgumentHeader: Students were not expected to identify each stage of the argument in minute detail. It was up to the student to select elements of the text to demonstrate their analytical capacity.
